mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARD_PAYMENT_TRANS ( UNIQUE_ID, STATUS, AMOUNT, TAX, ENC_CARD_NUMBER, ENC_CARD_EXPIRE, ENC_CARD_CVC, CARD_QUOTA, TRANSACTION_ID, REGIST_DATE ) VALUES ( #{uniqueId}, #{status}, #{amount}, #{tax}, #{encCardNumber}, #{encCardExpire}, #{encCardCvc}, #{cardQuota}, #{transactionId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
mapper.select: SELECT UNIQUE_ID, STATUS, AMOUNT, TAX, NVL(CANCEL_AMOUNT, 0) AS cancelAmount, NVL(CANCEL_TAX, 0) AS cancelTax, ENC_CARD_NUMBER, ENC_CARD_EXPIRE, ENC_CARD_CVC, CARD_QUOTA, APPL_DATE, CANCEL_DATE FROM CARD_PAYMENT_TRANS WHERE UNIQUE_ID = #{uniqueId}

SELECT (AMOUNT - SELECT NVL(SUM(AMOUNT), 0) FROM CARD_CANCEL_TRANS WHERE UNIQUE_ID = #{uniqueId} AND STATUS IN ('CANCEL', 'PRTCCANCEL')) AS cancelAbleAmount, (TAX - SELECT NVL(SUM(TAX), 0) FROM CARD_CANCEL_TRANS WHERE UNIQUE_ID = #{uniqueId} AND STATUS IN ('CANCEL', 'PRTCCANCEL')) AS cancelAbleTax FROM CARD_PAYMENT_TRANS WHERE UNIQUE_ID = #{uniqueId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARD_CANCEL_TRANS ( CANCEL_UNIQUE_ID, STATUS, AMOUNT, TAX, UNIQUE_ID, TRANSACTION_ID, REGIST_DATE ) VALUES ( #{cancelUniqueId}, #{status}, #{amount}, #{tax}, #{uniqueId}, #{transactionId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
INSERT INTO PAYMENT_TRANSACTION_LOCK ( TRANSACTION_KEY, TRANSACTION_ID, REGIST_DATE ) VALUES ( #{transactionKey}, #{transactionId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
